entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
